definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: She piped the skirt with blue silk.
sentences.chinese: 她用藍綢子給裙子滾邊。

sentences.english: She wore a white dress with a lace border.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件有着雷絲滾邊的白色洋裝。

sentences.english: Night wears a black cloak lined with fire, studded inside with gleaming stars.
sentences.chinese: 夜穿着火滾邊的黑袍，袍內綴滿閃爍的星星。

sentences.english: Angled hand pockets with leather piping, back welt pockets.
sentences.chinese: 斜角手皮革滾邊口袋，背面貼邊口袋。

sentences.english: A more complex form of binding is apparent when attaching a shirt collar.
sentences.chinese: 裝男式襯衫領顯然是更復雜的一種滾邊形式。

sentences.english: Explains structure of rolling mill and its working process.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了滾邊機的結構和工作過程。

sentences.english: Contestants must wear a white karate gi without stripes or piping.
sentences.chinese: 選手須穿著白色無條紋及無滾邊之空手道服。

sentences.english: The border of the shoes is worn. Mom promised to buy me a new one.
sentences.chinese: 滾邊已經讓我弄破了，媽媽說要買雙新的。

sentences.english: She is piping up her dress.
“The worst case I’ve had was a guest who sewed money into the hem of the curtains, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “我遇到過最厲害的是把錢縫進窗簾滾邊中，”他說。

definition: spiral pattern/whorl of fingerprint/thread of screw
